translation.title: Fassara
translation.autoTranslateHint: Fassara bugaggu da bayanai ta atomatik zuwa harshinka

privacy.title: Sirri
privacy.ipProtectionHint: Mai watsawa yana ɓoye adireshin IP ɗinka amma yana iya rage ingancin kira. Haɗin kai tsaye ya fi sauri amma yana bayyana IP ɗinka ga mai kira.

options.nonInnerCircle: Watsawa waɗanda ba na kusa ba kawai (shawarar da ake ba)
options.off: Yarda da haɗin tsaye ga kowa (mafi kyaun inganci)
